recipes.name: Grilled Chicken Salad
steps: Season chicken with salt and pepper
Combine and drizzle with olive oil and lemon
common_mistakes: Not letting chicken rest loses juices

recipes.name: Egg White Veggie Omelette
steps: Add chopped veggies and cook 2 min
Pour egg whites and cook until set

recipes.name: Refreshing Cucumber Salad
steps: Mix yogurt with salt and cumin
common_mistakes: Adding too much salt draws water out
Not draining cucumber makes salad watery

recipes.name: Lemon Herb Steamed Fish
steps: Place lemon slices and dill on top
common_mistakes: Not enough seasoning makes it bland

recipes.name: Garlic Zucchini Noodles
steps: Heat olive oil with minced garlic
common_mistakes: Too much oil defeats the purpose

recipes.name: Asian Turkey Lettuce Wraps
steps: Cook turkey in pan until browned
common_mistakes: Lettuce wilts if served too warm

recipes.name: Low-Carb Cauliflower Rice
common_mistakes: Too much water makes it soggy

recipes.name: Quick Shrimp Veggie Stir Fry
common_mistakes: Low heat steams instead of sears

recipes.name: Fresh Tomato Soup
steps: Pour in broth and simmer 15 min
common_mistakes: Not cooking tomatoes enough makes soup acidic

recipes.name: Herb Baked Chicken Breast
steps: Rub chicken with oil and seasonings

recipes.name: Hearty Vegetable Soup
steps: Saute in pot with little oil
Add broth and bring to boil
common_mistakes: Cutting vegetables unevenly gives uneven cooking

recipes.name: Protein Greek Yogurt Bowl
common_mistakes: Adding too much honey adds calories
Letting sit too long makes chia gummy

recipes.name: Light Tuna Salad
common_mistakes: Not draining tuna makes salad watery

recipes.name: Asian Clear Vegetable Soup
common_mistakes: Overcooking bok choy makes it mushy
Too much soy sauce makes it salty

recipes.name: Cool Cucumber Raita
common_mistakes: Not squeezing cucumber makes raita watery

recipes.name: Perfect Poached Eggs
common_mistakes: Old eggs don't hold shape well

recipes.name: Lemon Roasted Asparagus
common_mistakes: Thin spears cook faster than thick

recipes.name: Spiced Tofu Scramble
common_mistakes: Not pressing tofu makes it watery

recipes.name: Carrot Ginger Soup
common_mistakes: Not cooking carrots enough = lumpy soup

recipes.name: Power Chicken Rice Bowl
steps: Grill or pan-fry chicken 6 min per side

recipes.name: High Protein Beef Stir Fry
common_mistakes: Cutting with grain makes beef tough

recipes.name: Baked Salmon with Sweet Potato
steps: Cube sweet potato and toss with oil
Season salmon with salt and dill

recipes.name: Power Eggs on Toast
common_mistakes: Bread gets soggy if sits too long

recipes.name: Protein-Packed Turkey Meatballs
steps: Mix turkey with egg and breadcrumbs
common_mistakes: Too large balls don't cook through

recipes.name: Protein Dal Curry
steps: Rinse lentils and cook with water
common_mistakes: Not skimming foam gives gritty texture

recipes.name: Peanut Butter Chicken
steps: Brown chicken thighs 5 min per side
Mix peanut butter, soy, coconut milk
common_mistakes: Chicken not browned enough = pale color
Sauce too thick - thin with water

recipes.name: Greek Protein Bowl
common_mistakes: Not draining lamb fat makes bowl greasy

recipes.name: Tuna Protein Pasta
common_mistakes: Not enough oil makes it dry

recipes.name: Builder's Oatmeal Bowl
steps: Stir in egg whites while hot
Mash half the banana into oats
common_mistakes: Adding protein powder to boiling oats clumps
Raw egg whites if not mixed hot enough

recipes.name: Chicken Burrito Bowl
steps: Cook rice and season with lime

recipes.name: Garlic Butter Shrimp with Rice
steps: Add shrimp and cook 3 min per side
common_mistakes: Too much garlic burns and becomes bitter

recipes.name: Korean Egg Rice Bowl
steps: Drizzle sesame oil and soy sauce

recipes.name: Thick Protein Smoothie Bowl
steps: Add protein powder and minimal milk
common_mistakes: Too much liquid = not thick enough
Blending too long warms it up

recipes.name: Grilled Steak with Vegetables
steps: Season generously with salt and pepper
Grill 4 min per side for medium

recipes.name: High Protein Paneer Tikka
steps: Cut paneer and vegetables into cubes
Grill or bake at 200C for 15 min
common_mistakes: Low heat makes paneer soft not charred

recipes.name: Protein Chickpea Curry
common_mistakes: Not cooking onions enough = raw taste

recipes.name: Muscle Building Hash and Eggs
steps: Cube and cook potatoes until crispy
Add ground beef and break up
Make wells and crack eggs in
Cover and cook until eggs set

recipes.name: Bodybuilder's Parfait
common_mistakes: Too much honey adds empty calories

recipes.name: Protein Egg Fried Rice
common_mistakes: Low heat steams rice instead of fry

recipes.name: Chicken Protein Wrap
common_mistakes: Overfilling makes wrap hard to roll

recipes.name: Dal Tadka
steps: Make tadka with ghee and cumin

recipes.name: Crispy Masala Dosa
steps: Add oil and cook until crispy

recipes.name: Crispy Tonkatsu
steps: Season and coat in flour, egg, panko

recipes.name: Chicken Congee
steps: Simmer rice with lots of water

recipes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
steps: Toss hot pasta with egg mix

recipes.name: Cheese Quesadilla
steps: Fold and cook 2 min per side

recipes.name: Albondigas Soup
steps: Mix meat with rice and herbs

recipes.name: Thai Omelette
steps: Heat lots of oil very hot

drinks.name: Night Time Casein Shake
drinks.health_note: Slow release protein for overnight recovery
